priority.name: high
priority.description: This PR should be reviewed ASAP.

priority.name: medium
priority.description: This PR should be reviewed after all high priority PRs.

priority.name: low
priority.description: This PR should be reviewed after all high and medium PRs.

priority.name: none
priority.description: This PR has no priority - can be reviewed any time.

status.name: rejected
status.description: This issue is considered rejected. It will not be worked on.

status.name: waiting
status.description: This issue waits for feedback from author.

status.name: in progress
status.description: This issue is being worked on.

status.name: accepted
status.description: This issue is accepted as valid, but it's not being worked on yet.

type.name: performance
type.description: This issue reports a problem with performance.

type.name: fix
type.description: This PR contains fixes to existing features.

type.name: test
type.description: This PR contains new tests for existing functionality or fixes to existing tests.

type.name: documentation
type.description: This PR contains updates to the documentation in code, README or .pubnub.yml.

type.name: refactor
type.description: This PR contains refactored existing features.

type.name: build
type.description: This PR contains changes to the build system (like Travis or publishing a package).

type.name: chore
type.description: This PR contains changes that are not covered by other types (stylistic, dependency updates, etc).
